mapper.select: select t.id, t.name, c.id owner_id, c.name owner from tag t join rel_tag_tag rtt on t.id=rtt.parent_tag_id join customer c on rtt.child_tag_id = c.id where t.tag_type_code = 'TR' and rtt.code = 'C' order by t.name

select tr.id, t.name, c.id owner_id, c.name owner, tr.content_code , tr.no_cars, tr.arrival_dt , t.description, t.tag_type_code, t.active from train tr join tag t on tr.id = t.id join customer c on tr.owner_id=c.id where s.id = #{param1}
mapper.insert: insert train ( id, owner_id, no_cars, content_code, arrival_dt ) values( #{id}, #{ownerId}, #{noCars}, #{contentCode}, #{arrivalDt} )
